name: Ludum Dare 34
description:
Welcome everyone !

ReachTheTop is a pixel art rogue-like prototype made for the Ludum Dare 34 compo competition.

Here is the link to the ludum dare's entry.

The goal is to try to go to the highest floor you can by collecting coins from slims and buy weapons and armor.

The controls are simple:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to attack
  • B to buy (in front of an item)

It is glichy and unperfect because I had not enough time for what I planned. Actually the game was not design for a quick development period. That's why I am working on a second version every evening and hope to make it on the internet soon !

Have fun playing and please give feedback if you feel like it, they are extremely valuable to me.
